term.title: scattering plane

item.text: The plane containing the incident light beam and the line from the centre of the scattering system to the observer.

sources.item: PAC, 1983, 55, 931. 'Definitions, terminology and symbols in colloid and surface chemistry. Part 1.14: Light scattering (Provisional)' on page 932 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198355060931)
